TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Select t1.snap_id ,t1.PERIOD_ID ,t1.req_run_ts ,d.RECN_SUMM_GID ,d.recn_summ_typ_cd ,d.snap_stat_cd from vrap.tsnap t1 ,vrap.tsnap t2 ,VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL D WHERE T1.SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD = 2 --(RUNNING) and t1.period_id = t2.period_id and t1.model_typ_cd = t2.MODEL_TYP_CD and t1.RUN_MODE_CD = t2.RUN_MODE_CD and t2.SNAP_SEQ_NB = -1 -- restrict to current snaps only and t2.snap_id = d.SNAP_ID and d.SNAP_STAT_CD = 1 -- restrict to only good/active recons from the current snapshot and d.recn_summ_typ_cd = 1

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: This table is used for storing the RECN_SUMM_GID for the Recon snapshot, for the Recon Position (RCNT_RECN_EXTN_CLM) to be recorded in TRBI database.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL

SHORTCUT.COMMENTS: This table is used for storing the RECN_SUMM_GID for the Recon snapshot, for the Recon Position (RCNT_RECN_EXTN_CLM) to be recorded in TRBI database.
SHORTCUT.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Select t1.snap_id ,t1.PERIOD_ID ,t1.req_run_ts ,d.RECN_SUMM_GID ,d.recn_summ_typ_cd ,d.snap_stat_cd from vrap.tsnap t1 ,vrap.tsnap t2 ,VRAP.TSNAP_RECN_OBJ_DTL D WHERE T1.SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD = 2 --(RUNNING) and t1.period_id = t2.period_id and t1.model_typ_cd = t2.MODEL_TYP_CD and t1.RUN_MODE_CD = t2.RUN_MODE_CD and t2.SNAP_SEQ_NB = -1 -- restrict to current snaps only and t2.snap_id = d.SNAP_ID and d.SNAP_STAT_CD = 1 -- restrict to only good/active recons from the current snapshot and d.recn_summ_typ_cd > 1

SHORTCUT.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_OBJ_DTL

SHORTCUT.NAME: TSNAP_RECN_OBJ_DTL

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the new RECN_SUMM_STAT_CD = 2 then the workflow is just starting, set the SUMM_PRCS_STRT_TS at this time. All other statuses, the process is just in the middle or at the end, and it should remain the value it was when it came into this mapping.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SUMM_PRCS_STRT_TS

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: If the new RECN_SUMM_STAT_CD = 4 then the workflow is at the end, set the SUMM_PRCS_END_TS at this time. All other statuses, the process is just starting or at the middle, and it should remain null which is the original value.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SUMM_PRCS_END_TS

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: This sets the snapshot status codes to ERROR value SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD RECN_SNAP_STAT_CD
SESSION.NAME: s_m_Dummy_Set_RECN_SNAP_STAT_to_ERR

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: update vrap.TSNAP set RECN_SNAP_STAT_CD = 99 ,SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD = 99 where SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD = 2;

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Email Text
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
You should not need to restart this process entirely. This task would have run only because the update to RCNT_RECN_SUMM_QUE did not succeed. Look at manually setting the RECN_SUMM_STAT_CD to the proper value and then marking this as successful in the Cash process controller.
-------
Before restarting this process, you will need to reset the TSNAP.RECN_SNAP_STAT_CD to 1 and TSNAP.SNAP_RUN_STAT_CD = 2 again.
If any records were inserted in to the TSNAP_RECN_PSTN_DTL or the TSNAP_RECN_OBJ_DTL table, they MAY need to be removed.
The mapping %m ran in the %s session in the %w workflow ran in %d.
%t
%l
%r
Session Log is attached %g
